description: For a batch of security controls and standards, this operation updates the enablement status of a control in a standard.

parameters.name: StandardsControlAssociationUpdates
parameters.description: Updates the enablement status of a security control in a specified standard. Calls to this operation return a RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND_EXCEPTION error when the standard subscription for the control has StandardsControlsUpdatable value NOT_READY_FOR_UPDATES. (dict) --- An array of requested updates to the enablement status of controls in specified standards. The objects in the array include a security control ID, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the standard, the requested enablement status, and the reason for updating the enablement status. StandardsArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the standard in which you want to update the control's enablement status. SecurityControlId (string) --- The unique identifier for the security control whose enablement status you want to update. AssociationStatus (string) --- The desired enablement status of the control in the standard. UpdatedReason (string) --- The reason for updating the control's enablement status in the standard.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedAssociationUpdates
nested_items.description: A security control (identified with SecurityControlId, SecurityControlArn, or a mix of both parameters) whose enablement status in a specified standard couldn't be updated.

nested_items.name: StandardsControlAssociationUpdate
nested_items.description: An array of control and standard associations for which an update failed when calling BatchUpdateStandardsControlAssociations.

nested_items.name: StandardsArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the standard in which you want to update the control's enablement status.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the security control whose enablement status you want to update.

nested_items.name: AssociationStatus
nested_items.description: The desired enablement status of the control in the standard.

nested_items.name: UpdatedReason
nested_items.description: The reason for updating the control's enablement status in the standard.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the unprocessed update of the control's enablement status in the specified standard.

nested_items.name: ErrorReason
nested_items.description: The reason why a control's enablement status in the specified standard couldn't be updated.
